description: The result of executing a single transaction.

error_message.description: If there is no error message, this execution was processed successfully. If there is an error message, this execution failed to fully process for the stated reason.

limit.description: What was the maximum allowed gas limit for this transaction?.

consumed.description: How much gas was consumed executing this transaction.

cost.description: How much was paid for this transaction.

payment.description: Breakdown of payments made to cover the cost.

transfers.description: A record of transfers performed while executing this transaction.

size_estimate.description: The size estimate of the transaction

effects.description: The effects of executing this transaction.
